game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: A legendary temple has been discovered deep in the jungle, and rumors of a powerful artifact have drawn many adventurers to this location. Your goal is to navigate the treacherous terrain and reach the heart of the temple before your competitors do.
game.reward: The Golden Idol and 1000 gold pieces

tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the lost temple.
tasks.description: Look for a hidden path through the dense foliage. Be careful of the deadly creatures that inhabit this area.
tasks.location: The Jungle, near the old ruins

tasks.objective: Navigate the traps and puzzles inside the temple.
tasks.description: Use your wits to overcome the obstacles and reach the inner sanctum. A map of the temple's layout can be found on the wall nearby.

tasks.objective: Defeat the temple guardian and claim the artifact.
tasks.description: Face off against a fearsome creature in combat. Use your skills and abilities to emerge victorious.
tasks.location: The Heart of the Lost Temple
